page.title: 06SMALL BUSINESSES
page.content: Witheridge has quite a few small businesses.There are four builders , each employing some workers , three electricians , also employing others , a tree feller who supplies logs and an agricultural engineer,formerly a blacksmith.A local artist makes hand printed christmas cards which are sold all over England.There is one small factory employing about eight workers. Here they make wedding dresses and these are sold as far off as Scotland and Ireland.They also make soft toys.These small businesses,together with the local shops provide few over fiftypeople.This is very different to forty years ago when many local men worked on the farms.Nowadays, hardly anyone frm the village works full time on a farm,although a number do some part - time work.
